name: Limbo
description: A little boy seeks to rescue his lost sister from a dreary, dangerous world in this puzzle-platformer that kicked off the Summer of Arcade in 2010.

name: Devil May Cry 4
description: The fourth game in the popular Capcom action franchise, Devil May Cry. Take on the role of new playable character Nero, as he uses his swanky demon arm to beat the hell out of a demon invasion in the castle town of Fortuna.

name: Sleeping Dogs
description: Originally known as "Black Lotus", and then "True Crime: Hong Kong", Sleeping Dogs is an open-world action game that tells the story of undercover cop Wei Shen as he infiltrates the ranks of the murderous Triads in Hong Kong.

name: The Walking Dead
description: Presenting an original story in the same universe as the comic book series of the same name, The Walking Dead is a five-part adventure game from Telltale that follows the story of a convicted murderer, his guardianship over a young girl, and his co-operation with a roaming group of survivors in a zombie apocalypse.

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
description: The sixth main installment of the Assassin's Creed franchise, set in the Caribbean during the age of piracy in the early 18th century. Players explore the memories of Edward Kenway, a charismatic pirate (turned reckless Assassin) and the grandfather of Connor Kenway, the protagonist of Assassin's Creed III.

name: Terraria
description: Terraria adds upon its inspiration with a wider variety of things to create, unique enchanted items, and an overall goal of descending into Hell and defeating the sinister bosses lurking there.

name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
description: The tenth installment of the long-running shooter franchise introduces a brand new storyline, where the United States is under threat from a coalition of South American nations, and must employ a special group of operatives known as "Ghosts" to survive.

name: Minecraft
description: A procedurally-generated game of world exploration, resource harvesting, and freeform construction. It supports local and online multiplayer, and is regularly updated with new content and features.

name: Ryse: Son of Rome
description: Set in ancient Rome circa 68 A.D, this third-person action game follows Marius Titus as he sets out to avenge his fallen family. Developed by Crytek as an exclusive Xbox One launch game.

name: Infinity Blade
description: Infinity Blade is the first iOS game to use the Unreal Engine. The game pits players against a variety of massive foes on a quest to slay the God King.

name: Battlefield 4
description: DICE's popular multiplayer-focused shooter series continues, making its debut appearance on the PS4 and Xbox One.

name: APB Reloaded
description: APB Reloaded is a persistent online shooter created by Real Time Worlds, developer of Crackdown, in which players are able to choose between enforcers and criminals as they duke it out in the streets of San Paro.

name: Forza Motorsport 5
description: Forza Motorsport's debut on the Xbox One.
modes: ,Multiplayer online game,Split screen (computer graphics),Single-player video game

name: Pinball FX2
description: Pinball FX2 is a free shell for downloadable pinball tables. The tables are sold individually or in packs of four.

name: Contrast
description:
A game developed by a small independent company called Compulsion Games.

A puzzle platformer that plays with shadows and mixes 3D with 2D perspectives.

name: Need for Speed Rivals
description: A cross-gen open-world driving game set in a fictional Redview County.

name: Killer Instinct
description: Killer Instinct is a two-player fighting game that debuted in 1994. It used pre-rendered 3D characters instead of sprites, impressive for its time, and helped cement combo systems and finishing moves as fighting genre staples.

name: The Wolf Among Us
description: A prequel to the Fables comic book series, The Wolf Among Us tells a tale of the reformed Big Bad Wolf of childhood folklore (who is the sheriff of a secluded community of fables in 20th century New York City) as he investigates a series of grisly murders.

name: The Banner Saga
description: A turn-based tactics game, set in a Viking-inspired fantasy world.

name: Shadow Warrior
description: Legendary, quick-witted swordsman Lo Wang returns to fight demonic forces in this total re-imagining of 3D Realms's 1997 Asian-themed first-person shooter of the same name.

name: Happy Wars
description: The first free-to-play game for the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade) has two cutesy teams brutally facing off by capturing spawn points and sieging each other's castle.

name: The Walking Dead: Season Two
description: After separating from her friend Lee, young orphan Clementine must survive through the undead apocalypse with a new roaming group of survivors in this sequel to Telltale's original five-part adventure based on the comic book The Walking Dead.

name: Max: The Curse of Brotherhood
description: A 2D Side Scrolling Platforming developed by Press Play for the Xbox 360, Xbox One and PC.

name: NBA Live 14
description: EA's revival of the NBA Live series that followed several years of cancellations and false starts. It was released exclusively on the new generation of PlayStation 4 and Xbox One hardware.
modes: ,Single-player, multiplayer, Road to the Playoffs, Slam Dunk Challenge, Rising Star Mode, Ultimate Team

name: Killer Instinct
description: After 17 years on hiatus, the original combo-heavy fighting game franchise returns as a free-to-play launch title for the Xbox One.

name: Dead Rising 3
description: Escape from the zombie-infested city of Los Perdidos, California in the third installment of Capcom's Dead Rising franchise.

name: Resident Evil
description: A remake of the first game in the pre-eminent video game horror series, featuring a graphics overhaul, as well as several new gameplay features, environments, and unlockable modes that weren't included within the original version.

name: Zombie Driver
description: An old school styled driving game inspired by the original GTA 1 and 2, but now with zombies.

name: Octodad: Dadliest Catch
description: In this sequel to the indie classic, Octodad returns, to live an idyllic life with his wife and children that would be absolutely perfect aside from the fact that he's an octopus. Fortunately, thanks to his clever disguises, nobody suspects a thing...

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is a modern crime epic featuring a crew of three protagonists rolling through the diverse landscape of the fictional state of San Andreas.

name: Rayman Legends
description: Rayman Legends is the sequel to 2011's Rayman: Origins.

name: CastleStorm
description: Defend your pre-built castle while laying siege on your opponent's using a variety of different units (including your hero, your ballista, and some troops) and powerful spells in this side-scrolling action real-time strategy game.

name: Volgarr the Viking
description: A tough-as-nails, retro-styled action game published by Adult Swim.

name: Zoo Tycoon
description: The original zoo-management game returns as a console title (for the Xbox 360 and Xbox One), allowing players to build functioning zoos, to keep animals and guests happy, and to drive around their zoo in a magic buggy. Beep beep.

name: Rocksmith 2014
description: The second edition of Rocksmith from Ubisoft features a new soundtrack, enhancements to the user interface, and a slew of new games and lessons aimed at helping learn how to play the guitar.

name: Ultratron
description: Ultratron began as an XNA Xbox Indie game and was rebuilt for a full release on Steam. It's a futuristic dual-joystick shooter. Curve Studios is bringing the full version to new consoles in early 2015

name: Thief
description: The fourth installment in the Thief franchise and the second project currently in development by Eidos Montréal. The title has been deemed a reboot.

name: Mirror's Edge
description: The reboot of the previously one-titled series, the game was officially unveiled during EA's E3 2013 press conference.

name: Crimson Dragon
description: This spiritual successor to Panzer Dragoon was released on November 22, 2013 exclusively on the Xbox One.

name: Project CARS
description: Project CARS (short for Community Assisted Racing Simulator) is a community funded racing simulator currently under development from Slightly Mad Studios, the developer of the Need for Speed: Shift series.

name: LocoCycle
description: LocoCycle is an Xbox One launch title from Twisted Pixel Games. Players control I.R.I.S., an experimental motorcycle on the run from Big Arms, a division of Big Science.

name: Watch Dogs
description: A third-person open-world game from Ubisoft, set in a dark alternate version of the US where corporations track and catalog all online behavior over a vast data network. A vigilante group called the Watch_Dogs hacks into this data, using it to hunt criminals.

name: Lifeless Planet
description: An adventure game in the same vein as Ico or The Dig, Lifeless Planet tells the story of an anonymous astronaut who is transported to a faraway planet with no way to return to Earth, only to discover the remains of an extensive Soviet-era facility.

name: Angry Birds: Star Wars
description: The popular science fiction film franchise crosses over into Angry Birds territory.

name: Pier Solar and the Great Architects
description: High-definition remake of the 2010 Genesis RPG.

name: Soda Drinker Pro
description: Drink sodas in various areas to win while collecting bonus sodas and contemplating the power of soda.

name: Sniper Elite III
description: In Sniper Elite III, players once again take on the role of World War II sniper Karl Fairburne, this time as he travels to Northern Africa to uncover a secret Nazi plot.

name: Forced
description: 1-4 player Tactical Arena Co-Op game, funded via Kickstarter.

name: Road Redemption
description: Road Redemption is a Kickstarter-funded spiritual sequel to Road Rash. Motorcycle-combat-racing for a new generation.

name: Earthlock: Festival Of Magic
description: Earthlock: Festival of Magic is an episodic RPG adventure with harvesting and crafting along with PVP mechanics.

name: Halo: Spartan Assault
description: A top-down shooter set between the events of Halo 3 and Halo 4, Halo: Spartan Assault details the first Spartan Ops missions of the UNSC SPARTAN-IV Program.

name: Stick It to the Man!
description: Platforming adventure about Ray, who awakens from a coma with a 16 foot pink spaghetti arm sticking out of his head and discovers that The Man is literally out to get him.

name: Titanfall
description: Set in a far-flung, mech-filled future, Titanfall is the first first-person shooter built by Respawn Entertainment, the studio formed by ex-employees of Call of Duty developer Infinity Ward.

name: Peggle 2
description: The long-awaited sequel to Peggle from PopCap.

name: Star Wars: Battlefront
description: The long-anticipated follow-up to the Battlefront games of the PS2/Xbox era. Now being developed by DICE and published by EA.

name: Aztez
description: Expand and maintain the Aztec Empire through strategic conquest and brutal, 2D combat. Will support the Occulus Rift on PC.

name: Fable Legends
description: Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Fable Legends is a free to play 4 versus 1 multiplayer game, where 4 players control heroes while 1 player takes the role of the villain. Developed by Lionhead Studios for the Xbox One and PC.

name: Cabela's African Adventures
description: Travel to Africa to hunt the most ferocious beasts alive across 5 different biomes.

name: Xbox Fitness
description: Xbox Fitness is a subscription based online fitness service built for the Xbox One's Kinect sensor.

name: Space Engineers
description: A sandbox space game focused on fun and building.

name: Chaos;Child
description: Chaos;Child is the fourth major entry in the Science Adventure franchise of visual novels.

name: Pure Pool
description: A pool game for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC containing no less than 100% all-natural billiards.

name: Silence: The Whispered World 2
description: Silence is the sequel to Daedalic Entertainment’s popular fantasy adventure game The Whispered World and features a new lead character and 3D graphics.

name: Strike Vector
description: Frantic high-speed aerial-combat action game played in 1st or 3rd person.

name: WWE 2K15
description: WWE 2K15 is the first game in the franchise to appear on the Xbox One and PlayStation 4.

name: NBA 2K15
description: Basketball returns in NBA 2K15.

name: Batman: Arkham Knight
description: Arkham Knight, developer Rocksteady's return to the Batman series, takes place one year after Arkham City. It promises to expand the open world from the previous game, allowing players to drive the Batmobile through Gotham City's streets.

name: Shadow Blade
description: Shadow Blade is a fast-paced ninja game.

name: Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn
description: Shaq returns for a next-level beat 'em up sequel crowdfunded by the fans. This time, they won't "FU" it up.

name: Magic 2015
description: 2014's entry in the Magic: The Gathering franchise.

name: Behemoth Game 4 (Working TItle)
description: A new strategy game from The Behemoth headed to Xbox One and PC.

name: Kalimba
description: Originally Project Totem, Kalimba is a platformer where multiple pieces of a totem pole must be controlled simultaneously.

name: Crossing the Line
description: Mystical First Person Shooter

name: Far Cry 4
description: Far Cry 4 puts the player in the mind of Ajay Ghale and pits him against a deadly antagonist and an even deadlier environment. Caught in the middle of a brutal Civil War while fulfilling his mother's dying wish, Ghale must fight back against the oppression of Kyrat's leader, Pagan Min, while also battling the ruthlessness of the jungle.

name: Dragon Ball XenoVerse
description: A fighting game for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, and PC set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.

name: Rise of the Tomb Raider
description: A new Tomb Raider game, following on from 2013's Tomb Raider reboot. The game is coming exclusively to Xbox platforms in Holiday 2015 with other unspecified platforms to follow once the timed exclusivity contract has expired.

name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
description: Chronicle the classic Xbox and Xbox 360 adventures of the Master Chief with a compilation of the first four main chronological installments of the Halo series, enhanced for the Xbox One with updated graphics and easy access to every multiplayer mode in the series' history.

name: Phantom Dust
description: A reimagining of the unique action strategy game heavily inspired by collectible trading card games. The game will feature a extensive 30+ hour JRPG campaign that retells the original story.

name: Nero
description: A story driven first person puzzle game developed by Storm in a Teacup.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015
description: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015, also known as PES 2015 and Winning Eleven 2015 in some regions, is a football simulation video game and the latest iteration in the Pro Evolution Soccer series developed by Konami Digital Entertainment.

name: Untitled Mass Effect Game
description: The next installment of the Mass Effect franchise is in development at BioWare Montreal.

name: Metro Redux
description: Metro Redux is a big overhaul of Metro 2033 and Metro: Last Light that includes significant visual and gameplay upgrades for a more uniform experience across both games.

name: Life Is Strange
description: An episodic adventure game based around time manipulation from Remember Me developers DONTNOD.

name: Ninja Pizza Girl
description: Ninja Pizza Girl is a flow-centric platforming game about bullying.

name: Wild Season
description: Wild Season is an RPG, Farming, Life, Simulation Game developed by Quickfire Games. The game revolves around how the main character must manage & mantain a farm, while dealing with the trappings of every day farm life and the end of the world.

name: Lacrosse 15
description: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.

name: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
description: When The Boss is captured by Satan, it's up to Johnny Gat and Kenzie Kensington to cause as much chaos as possible in Hell to rescue them in this standalone expansion to Saints Row IV.

name: Naughty Kitties
description: A side scrolling shoot 'em up with kitties.

name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round
description: The final update to Dead or Alive 5 brings the game to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Last Round features more characters, stages, and costumes than any other Dead or Alive game to date.

name: Rivals of Aether
description: Rivals of Aether is an indie fighting game set in a vast new world featuring a unique roster of characters.

name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack
description: A new take on Monopoly from Ubisoft.

name: The Jackbox Party Pack
description: A compilation containing Fibbage XL, Drawful, Word Spud, Lie Swatter and You Don't Know Jack (2015).

name: Wújìn Zhī Jiàn Mìngyùn
description: Wújìn Zhī Jiàn Mìngyùn (Infinity Blade Fate) is a Xbox One exclusive installment in the Infinity Blade series, released in China. It is a Kinect-powered compilation of different parts of the three previously released Infinity Blade titles.

name: Forza Motorsport 6
description: The 6th installment in the Forza Motorsport series.

name: Shiftlings
description: A single player/ local co-op puzzle platformer developed by Rock Pocket Games and published by Sierra.

name: Borderlands: The Handsome Collection
description: An enhanced remaster of Borderlands 2 and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel for PS4 and Xbox One including a new 4-player splitscreen mode for consoles.

name: Submerged
description: A game about being trapped in an ancient, half-submerged city. Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

name: Forza Horizon 2 Presents Fast & Furious
description: A standalone expansion for Forza Horizon 2 developed by Playground Games to promote the latest Fast & Furious film "Furious 7".

name: Giana Sisters: Dream Runners
description: The sequel to Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams introduces four-player multiplayer and an emphasis on speed and competition.

name: MotoGP 15
description: The 2015 edition of the official Grand Prix motorcycle racing game.
